channel.title: Cattle Guard on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Cattle Guard on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-80. Use I-80 East/US-95 North to Lovelock; use I-80 West/Alt. US-95 South to Reno. Turn left to enter the Rest Area. Notice the post mile marker at the base of the sign.

item.title: US-6 West - Welcome to California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-6 west. Taken at the Nevada-California state line. The cattle guard marks the actual state line.
